title: NVIDIA 550.67 Linux Graphics Driver Brings Wayland Fixes, Better Support for VKD3D Games
description:
NVIDIA released today the NVIDIA 550.67 graphics driver for Linux, FreeBSD, and Solaris systems, addressing various bugs to improve Wayland support, as well as support for various video games.

The post NVIDIA 550.67 Linux Graphics Driver Brings Wayland Fixes, Better Support for VKD3D Games appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Hyprland Marks 2-Year Anniversary With a New Release
description:
Hyprland 0.37.0 window tiling manager is a significant update, bringing new cursormgr fallbacks, animations, custom notification fonts, and more.

The post Hyprland Marks 2-Year Anniversary With a New Release appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Mastodon’s User Base Skyrockets to 15 Million
description:
With 15M users, Mastodon is redefining social media: decentralized, open-source, and free. Be part of the change.

The post Mastodon’s User Base Skyrockets to 15 Million appeared first on Linux Today.
